# Gov_Dashboards

Quarto + R dashboards using public economic data.

## Framework contract
1) API pull → raw tibble/JSON  
2) Parse/clean → standardized table (`date`, `value`, `series_id`, `label`, `freq`)  
3) Visualize → reusable plot functions (ggplot; optional plotly)

## Secrets
Set GitHub repo secrets (Settings → Secrets and variables → Actions):
- FRED_API_KEY
- BLS_API_KEY (later)
- BEA_API_KEY (later)

## Reproducibility
Use `renv` to lock package versions.
